div.div: Univ. of St. Thomas vs. Saint John's Univ.

tr.td: SJU won the loss and defers, UST will receive the opening kickoff.
Alexi Johnson kickoff 58 yards to the UST07, Tanner Bedard return 17 yards to the UST24 (Dusty Krueger).
Univ. of St. Thomas drive start at 15:00.
Jordan Roberts rush for 9 yards to the UST33 (Reid Bjorklund).
Jordan Roberts rush for 2 yards to the UST35 (Carter Hanson).
Jordan Roberts rush for no gain to the UST35 (Matt Hobby).

John Gould pass incomplete to Ryan Bradley (Reid Bjorklund).
